description: Comprehensive framework intelligence cache for AI agents - current versions, patterns, and deprecations

checkOnSave.description: Object-based configuration for rust-analyzer check on save

edition.description: Use Rust 2021 edition for latest features

rust-analyzer.checkOnSave-boolean.reason: Boolean syntax no longer supported, use object configuration

edition-2018.reason: Rust 2021 edition provides better defaults and new features

packaging.description: Use pyproject.toml for modern Python packaging

typing.description: Use type hints for all functions

modules.description: Use ESM by default in package.json

concurrency.description: Use Swift concurrency for async code

hooks.pattern: use client components with 'use client' directive
hooks.description: Explicit client component declaration in RSC

server-components.pattern: Server Components by default in Next.js App Router
server-components.description: Components are server components unless marked 'use client'

appRouter.description: Use App Router for new projects

serverActions.description: Server Actions for form handling and mutations

turbopack.description: Use Turbopack for faster development builds

compositionApi.description: Use Composition API with script setup

loader.pattern: export async function loader({ request }: LoaderFunctionArgs) {}

action.pattern: export async function action({ request }: ActionFunctionArgs) {}

handler.pattern: export const handler: Handlers = { GET(req, ctx) {} }

cells.pattern: export const QUERY = gql``; export const Success = () => {}

cssFirst.description: Tailwind 4 uses CSS-first configuration with @theme directive

cli.description: Use shadcn CLI to add components

icons.description: Use lucide-react for icons in shadcn projects

primitives.description: Use Radix primitives for accessible components

store.pattern: defineStore('id', () => { const count = ref(0); return { count } })

schema.pattern: export const users = pgTable('users', { id: serial('id').primaryKey() })

turbopack.description: Bundled with Next.js, use via next dev --turbo

newArch.description: Enable New Architecture for better performance

v2.description: Use Tauri 2.0 for cross-platform including mobile

client.pattern: import OpenAI from 'openai'; const openai = new OpenAI();

remote.pattern: npx turbo login && npx turbo link

function.pattern: inngest.createFunction({ id: 'my-fn' }, { event: 'app/user.created' }, async ({ event, step }) => {})

task.pattern: export const myTask = task({ id: 'my-task', run: async () => {} })

handler.pattern: export const handler: Handler = async (event, context) => {}
export default async (req: Request, context: Context) => {}

v1.replacement: export default async (req: Request, context: Context) => {}

middleware.description: Use clerkMiddleware for Next.js App Router

auth.description: Use auth() helper in server components
Use auth() function for session access

config.pattern: export const { handlers, auth, signIn, signOut } = NextAuth({ providers: [] })

ssr.description: Use SSR helpers for server-side auth

components.pattern: import { Html, Head, Body, Container } from '@react-email/components'

server.pattern: export default class Server implements Party.Server {}

handler.pattern: export default { async fetch(request, env, ctx) {} }

preferRHF.reason: React Hook Form preferred for performance

mandatory: Identify ALL relevant frameworks for current task
Use ONLY current patterns from intelligence cache
NEVER use deprecated patterns listed in cache
Update intelligence if older than 24h using refresh script
Validate generated configs against intelligence patterns
Check framework versions before suggesting dependencies

frontend: Use Tailwind 4 CSS-first config, not JS config
Use lucide-react for icons in shadcn projects
backend: Follow REST or GraphQL best practices
database: Use Prisma or Drizzle for TypeScript projects
